responsibities.description: Led the integration of various BI and data visualization tools, including Power BI, Tableau, Epic Systems, ServiceNow, Grafana, PowerPoint, and Domo, utilizing a centralized credential management for secure and seamless user access.
Designed and implemented a comprehensive backup and restore system for PostgreSQL databases, Vault secrets, and media files.
Integrated real-time metrics from DBus into our core product using Micrometer, Prometheus, and Grafana, implementing notifications to alert users of critical system usage.
Whitelabeled Grafana v7.5.15 source code, resulting in cost savings of approximately $100,000 by avoiding OEM licensing.
Leveraged Nvidia SLI Mosaic technology to enable 4K output and integrated Megapixel products for 8K content routing on LED panels with centralized control.
Integrated HashiCorp's Vault to secure critical media sources, including RTSP streams, VNC/RDP connections, and BI platforms.
Contributed to agile development processes and authored technical documentation to facilitate collaboration with stakeholders.
Played a key role in the technical build for Murex Market Risk migration from version 2.36 to 3.41, utilizing ANT scripts, bash scripts, and configuration management for seamless transition.
Built the Market Risk module within MX.3, adapting to diverse client and international entity requirements.
Implemented a greenfield market risk framework, encompassing scenario generation, application, and computations like VaR, Stress Testing, and Back Testing.
